texto: Empowerment enhances the motivation of people to take responsibility for their work and its results. This can be achieved by providing people with the necessary information, authority and freedom to make decisions related to their own work. Managers at all levels should motivate people to understand the significance and importance of their responsibilities and activities in relation to creating value for interested parties.
